articles.title: Higher risk of Bell's palsy after Sinovac's Covid-19 vaccine: Study - TODAYonline
articles.description: HONG KONG — The risk of Bell's palsy, a type of facial paralysis, is higher after Sinovac Biotech's Covid-19 vaccine CoronaVac, but should not be a deterrent to vaccination, according to a study published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases journal.
